name: CollisionFilter
desc: A set of masks that determine whether entities can collide during simulations.

items.name: static let sensor: CollisionFilter
items.desc: A collision filter for an entity that collides with everything.

items.name: var group: CollisionGroup
items.desc: The collision group or groups, stored as a bit mask, to which the entity belongs.

items.name: var mask: CollisionGroup
items.desc: The collision group or groups, stored as a bitmask, with which the entity can collide.

items.name: struct CollisionGroup
items.desc: A bitmask that defines the collision group to which an entity belongs.

items.name: static func == (CollisionFilter, CollisionFilter) -> Bool
items.desc: Indicates whether two collision filters are equal.

items.name: static func != (CollisionFilter, CollisionFilter) -> Bool
items.desc: Indicates whether two collision filters are not equal.
